data.persona: I spread gossip throughout the kingdom. I wear the finest of clothes. I am always protected from the outcomes of my villainy.
data.description:
You are in the Grand Ballroom.
There is a large marbled floor with ornate inlay-ed floor decorations.  The ceiling is tall and also ornately decorated with beautiful plaster decorations that touches by gold lining.  The space is high and well lit with many windows but has a dark musky smell.
There's a windows, a flag, a marbled floor, a decoration, a ceiling, and a floor decorations here.
The dancer and the royal family are here.

You are carrying a money and a flask, and wearing a Jacket.

data.short_motivation: I want the dancer to think the royal family is wasting money.
data.mid_motivation: I want the dancer to help me spread gossip around town about the royal family wasting money.
data.long_motivation: I want there to be a revolt against the royal family.
